everydayAdd: Everyday, Click4Loot adds new {gift} to the generator
counterMessage: if the live counter above is 0 you can try tomorrow.
startAndEnjoy: Just start the generator on top of the page and enjoy!
commentSuccess: Thank you! Your comment has been submitted and is being reviewed.
chooseAmount:
Hello {username}, 
Choose your amount of free {gift}

generationMessages.authenticating: Authenticating connection to free {gift} distribution network...
generationMessages.verifyingCredentials:
Verifying player credentials in global database 
for player {username} on {platform} platform...
generationMessages.completeAntibot: Complete last antibot step to receive your {amount} {gift}

verificationStep.congratsMessage: Congratulation {username} Your {amount} {gift} are ready to be sent to your account.
verificationStep.popularService: As you can imagine, our service is very popular, and we had to implement a bot blocker.
verificationStep.completeTransfer: To receive your free {gift} immediately, complete the transfer by proving you are a real player (and not a Bot used to abuse our services).
verificationStep.takesMinutes: It's of course free and takes only a few minutes.
